item.title: How to build good API?
item.description: What is a good API? Easy for consumers to read developers to mainatin extending Design: Ask users what features they like to see and get true use cases Test it out with examples Think through proper naming convention and use proper verbs(GET/POST/DELETE) Always version up APIs especially when backwards compatibility not allowed and it could break consumers pipeline. Convery Ratelimits in you header Easy to use, even without documentation Creation and Deletion of User accounts or data shared between mulitple accounts are strictly no
